description: Noncrossing bushes with n nodes; i.e. rooted noncrossing trees with n nodes and no nonroot nodes of degree 1.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
formula: Sum((-1)^(n-k)*2^(n-k)*binomial(n, k)*binomial(3*k, k-1), k=1..n)/n; G.f. satisfies z A^3 + 3 z A^2 + z A - A + z = 0Recurrence: 2*n*(2*n+1)*a(n) = (n+2)*(3*n-1)*a(n-1) + 4*(n-2)*(15*n-13)*a(n-2) + 76*(n-3)*(n-2)*a(n-3). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 08 2012a(n) ~ 19^(n+1/2)/(3*sqrt(Pi)*n^(3/2)*2^(2*n+2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 08 2012
author: _Emeric Deutsch_
